moreBlocks.lawyersAtBibyLawFirmSelectedForASuperLaw: • Biby, Jacob W. On a Super Lawyers® List

practiceAreas: Motor Vehicle Accidents|Trucking Accidents|Personal Injury|Premises and Liability|Workers Comp
description:
Located in Tulsa, Oklahoma, the Biby Law Firm provides unmatched counsel and support to clients across their region and throughout the state who suffered a serious injury or lost a loved one as the result of someone else's negligence or wrongdoing as well as those who experienced a debilitating injury or illness on the job.

Led by top-rated and award-winning trial lawyer, Jacob Biby, the law firm has become the trusted source for quality, effective legal advocacy for individuals and families suffering needlessly as the result of any of the following:

  • Car, truck, motorcycle and other motor vehicle accidents
  • Bicycle and pedestrian accidents
  • Aviation accidents
  • Oil field accidents
  • Construction accidents
  • Traumatic brain injuries and spinal cord injuries
  • Birth injuries, medical malpractice and nursing home abuse
  • Premises liability and defective products
  • Wrongful Death
  • Workers' compensation

No matter the cause of your injuries or losses, you can rely on Mr. Biby to fight hard to protect your rights and entitlements while aggressively pursuing the maximum amount of compensation on your behalf.

To date, Mr. Biby has recovered millions of dollars in settlements and verdicts for his plaintiff clients, including many seven-figure awards. His success has earned him a life-time membership in the Million Dollar and Multi-Million Dollar Advocates Forum, and he has earned a Top 40 Under 40 and Top 100 Trial Lawyer designations from the National Trial Lawyer along with many other top rankings and endorsements from his peers.

Moreover, Mr. Biby has received Superb client ratings on Avvo, and his law firm has enjoyed many testimonials and referrals from their satisfied clients. To find out more about how they can best assist you with achieving the justice you deserve, you can contact the Biby Law Firm by phone of through their website to schedule a free initial consultation. They also offer virtual consultations so that you do not have to further risk your health and safety to speak with them.
